title: If 'thanks' is informal and 'thank you' is formal, can we write in formal mails 'thanks and regards'? - Quora

response.answer_text: If 'thanks' is informal and 'thank you' is formal, can we write informal mails "thanks and regards"? In the official decorum, you can use “thanking you” to an equal and friendly person and “with regards” to the respectable persons. But usage of both the words looks not nice.
